General.Name: Shuang-Bang Industrial
General.Description: Shuang-Bang Industrial Corp. develops and manufactures polyurethane (PU) resins for shoes, synthetic leather cross linkers, and polyol resins in Taiwan. It offers synthetic resins, including solvent base resins, water base resins, PU foam resins, polyester polyol, and PU prepolymer / PU elastomer; hardeners, which include methylene dianiline and methylene chloroaniline; and photoinitiators. The company also provides TPU film series, a transparent thermoplastic polyurethane film/sheet; water base PU/TPU and water base PU/TPU/HMA series that uses water to replace organic solvents used in PU; solvent base PU/TPU and solvent base PU/TPU/HMA; and breathable TPU multi-layer film that uses breathable thermoplastic polyurethane film/sheet as adhesive. In addition, it offers direct coating materials, transfer lamination and dot lamination materials, and PU membranes. The company's products are used in sports shoes, medical supplies, clothing, and outdoor/sports goods. Shuang-Bang Industrial Corp. was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Nantou City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 3, Yongsing Road, Nantou City, Taiwan, 540
